revised_title: Investigations into the Segmental Representation of Movements in the Lumbar Region of the Mammalian Spinal Cord: Excitation of the Spinal Cord and Direct Excitation of the Spinal Nerve Roots
tldr: The author investigates the segmental representation of movements in the lumbar region of the mammalian spinal cord through excitation methods. The study aims to understand the degree to which certain movements are represented in specific segments and the relationship between the representation of one movement and another. The research focuses on the dog and monkey species, using electric stimulation to observe resulting movements.
